alert.note: Alert for Armstrong (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 19 at 3:24AM CDT until May 19 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Prairie Dog Town Fork Red River at Wayside 13NE affecting Armstrong County. For the Prairie Dog Town Fork...including Wayside 13NE...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Prairie Dog Town Fork Red River at Wayside 13NE. * WHEN...From this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Ranch and farm land within the flood plain begins to flood. Cattle in the flood plain are threatened * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.0 feet this morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.0 feet on 08/30/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 330 PM CDT.
